+ Disable Camel Case Words

++ local

CamelCase WikiWords are not enabled on this page b/c of the following option:

[camelCaseWordsEnabled: false]

++ global

In order to disable CamelCase WikiWords globally add the following property to a page in your wiki:

<<
[global.camelCaseWordsEnabled: false]
>>
